document_data.name: Sazza
document_data.mainbody:
'''Sazza''' was a [[goblin]] that pledged her allegiance to the [[Cult of the Absolute]].

{{Quote|My tribe's comin'. They're gonna burn this pretty place for the glory of the Absolute and 'ang ya by yer guts.|Sazza threatening an [[adventurer]] in the [[Emerald Grove]]}}
document_data.Description: The goblin had red hair worn in a side swept undercut. She wore clothing scraps with a feather pauldron and a belt adorned with small bones.
document_data.History: The zealous goblin was captured in a makeshift prison cell in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. The [[tiefling]], [[Arka]], wished to kill her. This, however, did not faze Sazza, as she believed she was blessed by the Absolute.
